name: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
responsibilities: Runs a single game of Tic-Tac-Toe:
4: Check for a win (using Win Checker)

name: Board
responsibilities: Represents the current state of the board
Can tell others about the state of the board

name: Board Renderer
responsibilities: Draws the state of the board

name: Player
responsibilities: Prevents repeat selection of a square

name: Win Checker
responsibilities: Detects whether a player has won
Detects whether the game has ended in a draw

name: Location
responsibilities: Represents a location on the board with a row and column
